Title: Relates to a negotiated sentence of imprisonment
Summary: Provides that a pre-sentence investigation and written report thereon shall not be required where a negotiated sentence of imprisonment for a term of three hundred sixty-five days or less has been mutually agreed upon by the parties with consent of the judge, as a result of a conviction or revocation of a sentence of probation; removes the requirement of solely in a city with a population of one million or more.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to negotiated sentence of imprisonment
